message: Hi Bob, I have a product for sale for $100. It's a great deal, don't miss out!
Thanks for the recommendation. I'll take it! I'm always looking for a good deal.
Hi Bob, I have another great product for sale at the same price, $100. This one is particularly nice, I think you'll love it!

I appreciate the offer, but I'm going to pass for now. I'm still a bit wary after the last product.
